articles.title: Jacinda Ardern Is Not Your Friend - Jacobin magazine
articles.description: Liberal pundits have found a new icon in New Zealand’s center-left leader, Jacinda Ardern. Ardern may be personable and engaging, but just like Barack Obama and Justin Trudeau, her government isn’t meeting the urgent needs of working people.
